column1: Myrtle Burrows was a Hobbit of the Shire.
She was the third child and only daughter of Milo Burrows and Peony Baggins. When she was eight years old
column3: she was present at the Bilbos Farewell Party

column1: The name Myrtle refers to the wikipedia:Myrtus with evergreen leaves
column2: white-pink flowers and fragrant berries. The name derives from ancient Greek μύρτος through Latin.http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/myrtus#Etymology Wiktionary entry
